name: shouldComponentUpdate-Children
description: React 'Shallow Equal' HOC implementation to optimize shouldComponentUpdate with children or React elements

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/rollup -c rollup.config.js -o index.cjs.js -f cjs -g react:React && node_modules/.bin/rollup -c rollup.config.js -o index.es.js -f es -g react:React

author: NoamELB & Tzook
